subject: Cybersecurity
title: The Twitter Hack of 2020: Inside Job via Social Engineering
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Twitter Hack of 2020: Inside Job via Social Engineering.

hook.text: Barack Obama, Elon Musk, and Apple all tweeted the same Bitcoin scam at the same time. Twitter was hacked.

buildup.text: In July 2020, attackers called Twitter employees posing as IT support and obtained internal tool access.

discovery.text: They used phone-based social engineering to get credentials, then hijacked 130 high-profile accounts.

twist.text: The mastermind was a 17-year-old from Florida. He made only $120,000 from a hack that could have done far more.

climax.text: The world's most powerful communication platform was brought down by a teenager with a phone.

punchline.text: A phone call beat Twitter's entire security team.

quiz.question: How did attackers gain access in the 2020 Twitter hack?
options: By social engineering employees via phone calls
